  • Uses of AgentException in i5.las2peer.api.security

    Subclasses of AgentException in i5.las2peer.api.security 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AgentAccessDeniedException
    Thrown if an agent cannot be unlocked.
    class  AgentAlreadyExistsException
    Thrown if an agent already exists, e.g. when storing another agent with the same id.
    class  AgentLockedException
    Thrown if an agent is locked but an unlocked agent is needed to call a method.
    class  AgentNotFoundException
    Thrown if an agent cannot be found.
    class  AgentOperationFailedException
    Represents an error caused by the network or the node.
    class  EmailAlreadyTakenException
    Thrown if the email address has already been taken.
    class  LoginNameAlreadyTakenException
    Thrown if the login name has already been taken.
    class  OIDCSubAlreadyTakenException
    Thrown if the OIDC sub has already been taken.

  • Uses of AgentException in i5.las2peer.communication

    Methods in i5.las2peer.communication that throw AgentException 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Message.open​(AgentImpl unlockedRecipient, AgentStorage storage)
    open the message, i.e. decrypt the content with the private key of the receiving agent the private key has to be unlocked first!
    void Message.open​(AgentImpl unlockedRecipient, AgentStorage storage, java.lang.ClassLoader contentClsLoader)
    open the message, i.e. decrypt the content with the private key of the receiving agent the private key has to be unlocked first!
    void Message.open​(AgentStorage storage)
    open the message, i.e. decrypt the content with the private key of the receiving agent The storage has to know an unlocked version of the recipient agent!
